entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Avoid completion of non-updated symbols #70212
  • IDE0241 (Unnecessary nullable directive) reported inside unreachable #if block + not reported in others #70210
  • Convert to Raw String changes significant line endings #70209
  • IFieldSymbol.AssociatedSymbol should return the IParameterSymbol of the primary constructor parameter, if the field is a capture #70208
  • Passing the method back into `DefaultParameterValue` crashes #70206
    17.9

Closed

  • public API for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #69111
  • Adding .editorconfig as a `<Compile>` item results in Roslyn exceptions that propagate through the project system #70134
  • Disallow `RequiresLocationAttribute` in more places in source? #70011
    17.8
  • Proposal: Add "effective" severity for rules in SARIF v2 logs #67365
  • Csc is slow when processing inheritance chain of generic types #70169
    17.8
  • Exception and several gold bars when using relational pattern on pointer type #70048
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Followup fix-all changes to report operation progress in code actions (including cancellation). #70213
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Followup fix-all changes to report operation progress in code actions. #70211
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ask for source generated state up front when getting the compile time solution #70205
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204

Merged

  • Update default razor project cache file name #70156
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Additional tests for 'use collection expression'. #70207
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'use collection expression' analyzer/fixer to support conversion when a capacity argument is passed. #70193
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Handle constant `null`s in pointer pattern matching #70113
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged, Next
  • Delpoy ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler with compiler #70203
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR for testing purposes #70174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use applicable EnsureCapacity() when length is known #70181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add ReferenceOutputAssembly="false" to language server dlls we don't ship #70195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
